com.example.app.repository

Class PersonRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.app.repository.PersonRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Repository<Person>

    public class PersonRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements Repository<Person>
    Provides the concrete Repository for the Person type. This class implements the default CRUD methods behavior using a DatabaseHelper instance to perform operations on the apps SQLite database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PersonRepository

        public PersonRepository(android.content.Context context)
        Main constructor for this class. Receives the Application's Context to be able to instantiate the DatabaseHelper. It uses a WeakReference to avoid accidental leaking if not released properly by calling this class's release() method.
        Parameters:
        context - the Application's Context instance.
